---
title: "About me"
---

I am a research assistant in the Indian Institute of Science's [Centre for Ecological Sciences](http://ces.iisc.ac.in/new/).
I work with [Professor Vishwesha Guttal](https://teelabiisc.wordpress.com/) under the guidance of [Akanksha Rathore](https://sites.google.com/view/akanksha-rathore/) on Lekking dynamics of Blackbuck (*Antilope cervicapra*) and contributing towards preserving the rare mating strategy in India.
